channel.title: Forced Teleportation
channel.description:
Players can force open interfaces while in dungeoneering or basically anywhere. I know how to make it so players can't use interfaces such as gnome glider while in dungeoneering, but my questions is how can I make it so if a player is in dungeoneering and uses any teleport at all, it will just delete all of their items? I tried using the same method as the black ladder but I'm not 100% sure if that will fix it, how do I force open interfaces myself so I can test?
EDIT: Also if anyone could test it for me, that would be nice too.

item.title: Forced Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @PIEBAR2FAR PIEBAR2FAR
item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

Go to your startTeleport void and add something like

if (c.inDung== true) { c.sendMessage("You cannot teleport from here."); return; }

that will make it so if they are in dung it will say they cant teleport and then wont let them

Read full topic

item.title: Forced Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

In the teleport method, check if they’re in the dungeoneering area and then removeAllItems();

Read full topic

item.title: Forced Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

what do you mean by “forcing them”

Read full topic

item.title: Forced Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Kail Lord_Kail
item.description:
@Lord_Kail wrote:

[quote=“strucker, post:2, topic:470439”]you should have a method called

[code]

removeAllItems();[/code][/quote]

I know, it’s just I’m not exactly sure where to put it. I know how to make the method work, but I know there is more than 1 way to teleport using forced interfaces. Do you know how to force interfaces? If so please let me know so I can test if my current methods work.

Read full topic

item.title: Forced Teleportation
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:

you should have a method called

[code]

removeAllItems();[/code]

Read full topic
